info.title: bio
info.description: I am Abdelkarim Monasef, a dedicated frontend developer with a passion for crafting visually engaging and user-friendly web applications. Armed with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I have extended my skills to include leading frontend frameworks such as React, employing them to build dynamic and responsive interfaces. My commitment to excellence is evident in my diverse project portfolio, ranging from personal portfolios to streaming websites, each showcasing my proficiency in technologies like Redux, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. Beyond coding, my journey includes experiences as a math teacher, emphasizing adaptability and tailored instruction. I am a fervent learner, as evidenced by my pursuit of certifications on platforms like HackerRank and comprehensive courses on Udemy. With a collaborative mindset and a keen problem-solving ability, I thrive in delivering impactful solutions that harmonize innovation and user-centric design.

info.title: interests
info.description: I My passion lies at the intersection of technologies and sciences, where the boundless possibilities of innovation and discovery unfold. I am captivated by the rapid evolution of technology, constantly immersing myself in the latest advancements in the digital landscape. From the intricacies of coding languages to the marvels of artificial intelligence, I find joy in exploring the limitless potential that technology offers to reshape our world. Simultaneously, my fascination with sciences fuels a curiosity for understanding the fundamental principles that govern the universe. Whether delving into the mysteries of quantum mechanics or staying abreast of breakthroughs in sustainable energy, I am committed to bridging the gap between technological innovation and scientific exploration. This dual passion not only defines my professional journey but also underscores my unwavering dedication to contributing meaningfully to the ever-evolving landscape of technology and sciences.

info.title: hard-skills
info.description: My proficiency in web development is underpinned by a robust set of hard skills. I excel in front-end technologies, demonstrating mastery in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. I have adeptly utilized popular front-end frameworks such as React, employing it to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces. Leveraging my expertise in state management with Redux, I've crafted seamless and scalable applications. My commitment to staying current with industry trends is evident in my utilization of frameworks like Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. Git and GitHub are integral components of my workflow, ensuring efficient version control and collaborative development. With a focus on mobile/responsive development and adept use of Chrome Dev Tools, I consistently deliver polished, user-friendly web experiences.

info.title: soft-skills
info.description: Beyond technical proficiency, my success as a frontend developer is enriched by a suite of essential soft skills. I am a dedicated collaborator, fostering a positive and productive team environment. Through remote pair-programming, I've honed effective communication and cooperation, ensuring cohesive project execution. Excellent problem-solving is a hallmark of my approach, allowing me to navigate challenges creatively and efficiently. My experience as a math teacher underscores my ability to tailor instruction to diverse learning needs, showcasing adaptability and empathy. Furthermore, my commitment to continual learning and collaboration is reflected in my active engagement with industry-standard certifications and comprehensive Udemy courses. These soft skills, combined with my technical acumen, contribute to my ability to deliver impactful and user-centric web solutions.

info.title: sports
info.description: While my primary domain is technology and development, I find balance and rejuvenation through my interest in sports. Engaging in physical activities not only promotes a healthy lifestyle but also fosters discipline, teamwork, and resilience—qualities that seamlessly translate into the professional realm. Whether it's the strategic finesse of playing chess or the adrenaline rush on a soccer field, I appreciate the diverse lessons sports offer. Beyond the competitive aspect, I value the camaraderie and shared passion that sports create, serving as a universal language that transcends boundaries. As a tech enthusiast, I recognize the importance of maintaining a holistic well-being, and sports provide the perfect outlet for achieving that balance in my life.

info.title: favorite-games
info.description: Football, tennis, and futsal stand as my triumvirate of favorite games, each offering a unique blend of excitement, strategy, and physical prowess. The dynamic and strategic nature of football, with its euphoric goals and team camaraderie, has held my fascination since childhood. Tennis, on the other hand, captivates me with its precision and individual skill, showcasing the elegance of one-on-one competition. Futsal, with its fast-paced indoor format, combines the best of both worlds, demanding quick thinking and close teamwork. Whether it's the thrill of a perfectly executed goal on the football field, the intensity of a decisive tennis match, or the fast footwork in a futsal game, these sports not only keep me active but also serve as a source of joy, inspiration, and a welcomed break from the digital realm.

education.description:
HackerRank Certifications :

● CSS :
● JavaScript (Basic) :
● JavaScript (advanced) :
● React (Basic) :

Udemy Courses :

● The Ultimate React Course 2023: React, Redux & More by Jonas Schmedtmann :
Mastering the React ecosystem comprehensively, from basics to advanced state management using Redux. Build powerful and scalable web applications with React, honing your skills in modern front-end development.

● Modern React with Redux [2023 Update] by Stephen Grider:
Delve into React and Redux, mastering the art of building scalable and efficient single-page applications. Gain practical experience through hands-on projects, learning industry best practices and solidifying your expertise in modern web development.

● The Complete JavaScript Course 2023:
From Zero to Expert! by Jonas Schmedtmann:
This is the biggest and the important course that I learned in my life, achieve JavaScript mastery, from foundational concepts to advanced topics. Develop dynamic web applications with hands-on projects, enhancing my proficiency in one of the most essential languages for web development.

● Advanced CSS and Sass: Flexbox, Grid, Animations and More! by Jonas Schmedtmann:
Elevate my CSS expertise with advanced concepts like Flexbox, Grid, and animations. Dive into Sass to streamline my stylesheets, gaining the tools to create sophisticated and visually appealing web designs.

● Build Responsive Real-World Websites with HTML and CSS by Jonas Schmedtmann:
Master the essentials of HTML and CSS, creating dynamic and responsive web pages. Learn modern design techniques to build user-friendly websites, enhancing your skills in front-end development.

Master's Degree in Civil Engineering - Faculty of Sciences.

Rabat I hold a master's degree in Civil Engineering, equipping me with advanced knowledge in structural design, project management, and sustainable infrastructure. My expertise encompasses the application of innovative engineering solutions, ensuring the development of resilient and efficient projects.

Bachelor's Degree in Energy Physics - Faculty of Science Rabat.

I possess a Bachelor's Degree in Energy Physics, cultivating a deep understanding of fundamental principles governing energy production, transformation, and utilization. My education has honed skills in renewable energy sources, quantum mechanics, and thermodynamics, preparing me to contribute to sustainable advancements in the dynamic field of energy physics.

High School Diploma in Physics Science - High School Abderrahman Dakhil - Ain El Aouda.

I hold a High School Diploma in Physics Science, where I laid the foundation for understanding the principles that govern the physical world. My coursework included mechanics, electromagnetism, and thermodynamics, fostering a curiosity for scientific inquiry and setting the stage for further academic pursuits in the field of physics.

experience.description:
Frontend Developer Projects

I engage in various projects to hone my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Through hands-on experience, I continuously refine my coding abilities. Notably, I showcase my largest and most impactful project prominently in the projects section, demonstrating my proficiency and dedication to advancing my web development expertise.

Mathematics Teacher - Ministry of National Education

● Delivered tailored instruction to cater to the diverse learning needs of students, fostering personalized learning experiences.
● Collaborated with peers to exchange best practices and collaboratively devise interdisciplinary projects.

Internship in Civil Engineering - TPF Pyramide Ingénierie

During my 6-month internship at TPF Pyramide Ingénierie, I actively contributed to civil engineering projects, gaining hands-on experience in structural design, project coordination, and site management. Collaborating with a dynamic team, I applied theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios, enhancing my skills in problem-solving and project execution within a professional engineering environment.
